subject: Olympic Games (2014)
Bobsledding
lead_paragraph: As Nicklas Backstrom of Sweden was barred from the hockey title game after failing a drug test, bobsledder Alexander Zubkov and cross-country racer Alexander Legkov helped the host nation top the final medals standings.
snippet: As Nicklas Backstrom of Sweden was barred from the hockey title game after failing a drug test, bobsledder Alexander Zubkov and cross-country racer Alexander Legkov helped the host nation top the final medals standings.
